description: armorial porcelain sugar bowl and cover; arms of Clavering impaling Palmer (George Clavering of Axwell Park, m. Anne Maria, daughter of Rev. William Palmer of Yacombe, Somerset); fox handles, acorn finial; floral design; spearhead rims
dimension: H.3-3/4 x W.5-5/8 x D.4 in. (overall)
title: Sugar Bowl
